import React from 'react' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput' function Dispensed() { const currentStock = { BCG : 30, DMR: 490, IPV: 70, VAT: 900, DBCG: 805 } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } return (

Dispensed Vaccines

{Object.entries(currentStock).map(key=>( ))}
Vaccine Name Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key.itemName}{key[0]}
) } export default Dispensed
